messages.title: ME AND MY FAMILY
messages.content: Hertsmere is my home. I grew up around Radlett...

messages.title: PROTECTING AND ENHANCING OUR AREA
messages.content: As our communities continue to grow and evolve...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I voted Remain, but believe we should respect the outcome of the referendum. That's why I'm backing the Prime Minister's deal so we can finally leave the EU in a smooth and orderly way, and then the Government can focus on the things that matter to you and your family.
My family has worked in the NHS. I'm focused on ensuring the redevelopment of the nearby Watford General...
I want to get great local state schools even stronger education. I know how important school and nursery...
I'm determined to let you know how bad the service can be...
I know how concerned people are with crime, particularly burglaries...
Strong public services rely on a strong economy. We will not raise the rate of VAT, income tax or national insurance...
We have won the battle with developers to look after the needs of residents across our area of the Green Belt...
Fighting the Radlett rail freight terminal.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's an enormous privilege to serve and I have sought to repay your trust with hard work...

politicalExperience.role: Hertsmere's MP for the last four years
politicalExperience.achievements: I have sought to repay your trust with hard work, a string sense of community, distinctive views on local issues...
